Package org.apache.xml.security.keys.storage.implementations

implementations of resolvers for retrieval for certificates and public keys from user-specified locations

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CertsInFilesystemDirectoryResolver This StorageResolverSpi makes all raw (binary) X509Certificates which reside as files in a single directory available to the StorageResolver.
KeyStoreResolver Makes the Certificates from a JAVA KeyStore object available to the StorageResolver.
SingleCertificateResolver This StorageResolverSpi makes a single X509Certificate available to the StorageResolver.
 

Package org.apache.xml.security.keys.storage.implementations Description

implementations of resolvers for retrieval for certificates and public keys from user-specified locations
